dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: The Cartpole-v0 task involves balancing a pole on a frictionless cart, which can move left and right. It has four continuous sensor inputs (the horizontal position and velocity of the cart, as well as the angle and angular velocity of the pole) and one discrete action output.
dcterms:title: Cartpole-v0

dcterms:creator: G. Brockman
V. Cheung
L. Pettersson
J. Schneider
J. Schulman
J. Tang
W. Zaremba
dcterms:description: The Cartpole-v1 task is similar to Cartpole-v0 but includes a reward function based on the number of steps that the pole remains within a certain angle of the vertical and does not move more than a certain amount horizontally from its initial position.
dcterms:title: Cartpole-v1
